creature_archetypes.name: Cursorial Forager
creature_archetypes.base_form: Small-to-medium plains quadruped with moderate endurance, opportunistic omnivore, minimal manipulative digits

coordination_rules: if eco.predation_index == high then group_size += 1 and request building:simple_windbreak
if tool.sophistication >= hafted then enable marrow_access_behavior
if eco.resource_scarcity >= medium then request tool:cutting_upgrade
if build.capacity < group_size then request building:larger_hut
if tool.edge_retention == low then request material:M1_high_fracture_quality
if build.storage_capacity < logistics.supply_rate then request building:granary_or_pit

creature_archetypes.name: Burrow Engineer
creature_archetypes.base_form: Fossorial omnivore with robust forelimbs and claws, low surface time

coordination_rules: if build.soil_stability == low then request tool:lever_and_shoring
if pop.density > capacity then request building:additional_chambers
if fuel_supply_density < need then request material:resin_pitch_or_charcoal

creature_archetypes.name: Arboreal Opportunist
creature_archetypes.base_form: Tree-dwelling glider/brachiator with grasping hands, high depth perception

publishes.desc: Ripeness and yield per canopy layer

coordination_rules: if canopy_yield_map shows surplus then request building:platform_cache
if container_volume low then request tool:basketry_upgrade
if projectile_mass too_low then request denser_lithic_selection
if fiber_strength low then request material:cordage_upgrade

creature_archetypes.name: Littoral Harvester
creature_archetypes.base_form: Shoreline wader with partially webbed feet, tolerance for brackish water

coordination_rules: if elevation_safety low then request building:stilt_platform
if tool.breakage_rate high then request material:hardstone_or_bone_teeth
if current_velocity high then increase_net_weight or relocate
if edge_retention low and fracture_quality high then request bifacial_retouch
if wood_density high then request hafting_upgrade
if cordage_strength low then request fiber_processing
if soil_compaction medium_high then request stone_tipped_upgrade
if soil_stability low then request shoring_kit
if team_size small and component_mass high then increase_mechanical_advantage

tool_archetypes.name: Binding, Containers, and Nets
tool_archetypes.base_form: Unspun vines and leaves used as ties

coordination_rules: if rain_frequency high then request waterproofing_pitch
match mesh_size to target_species_size for optimal ROI

tool_archetypes.name: Thermal & Firecraft
tool_archetypes.base_form: Ember carrying stick and natural fire use

coordination_rules: adjust kiln venting to wind_profile to stabilize temps

building_archetypes.name: Windbreak → Hut → Longhouse Workshop
building_archetypes.base_form: Temporary windbreak of branches and hides

coordination_rules: if role_diversity includes smiths then add_forge_bay

building_archetypes.name: Canopy Platforms
building_archetypes.base_form: Single tree platform lashed to branches

material_archetypes.name: M0_Organics
material_archetypes.base_form: Unprocessed plant fibers, wood, hide, bone

material_archetypes.name: M3_NativeMetals_to_M4_SmeltedMetals
material_archetypes.base_form: Cold-workable native metals (copper, gold) progressing to smelted alloys

enables: Bronze_Tools (then Iron with higher temp), Nails, Rivets

coordination_rules: attempt_smelt only if kiln_temp_peak and fuel_density sufficient
gather during surplus to reinforce bonds
expand work_bays to match guild headcount
